data.eml:eml: Histerid beetles of French Guiana. V. Revision of the genus Ebonius Lewis (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Omalodini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Degallier, Nicolas, Leivas, Fernando W. T., Moura, Daniel P. (2011): Histerid beetles of French Guiana. V. Revision of the genus Ebonius Lewis (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Omalodini). Zootaxa 2824: 44-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201733
